title: Lo-Fi Chill Beats
description: Relaxing lo-fi hip hop beats perfect for studying or chilling. Smooth basslines with jazzy samples.
author: BeatsLab

title: 808 Trap Banger
description: Heavy 808s with crispy hi-hats and a hard-hitting snare. Turn up the volume!
author: TrapKing

title: House Party Starter
description: Energetic house track with a bouncy bassline that gets everyone moving. Four-to-the-floor perfection.
author: DJ Nova

title: Ambient Soundscape
description: Atmospheric pads and subtle percussion creating a dreamy sonic landscape.
author: SonicDreams

title: Boom Bap Classic
description: Old school hip hop vibes with classic boom bap drums and vinyl crackle.
author: VintageBeats

title: Techno Underground
description: Dark and driving techno with pounding kicks and hypnotic synth patterns.
author: TechnoCore
